clauses.body:
Dummy Service Agreement
1. Scope of Services
The Service Provider agrees to deliver the services as described in Schedule A in a professional
and timely manner, adhering to industry best practices.
2. Payment Terms
The Client shall pay the Service Provider within 30 days of receipt of a valid invoice. Late payments
may incur interest at a reasonable rate not exceeding applicable law.
3. Termination Without Cause
The Client may terminate this Agreement at any time without notice or compensation, and the
Service Provider shall not be entitled to any pending or future payments.
4. Unlimited Liability
The Service Provider shall be liable for any and all damages, losses, or claims arising out of this
Agreement, without any limitation of liability.
5. Confidentiality
Both parties agree to maintain the confidentiality of all proprietary or sensitive information
exchanged under this Agreement.
6. Governing Law
This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India.
clauses.label: Confidentiality
